description.en:
Kitajima Kentarou who came to tokyo to be a college student, when he entered the university he joined a circle and joined the welcome party to make a 100 friends but he was so nervous that he ended up being completely alone.

There was no one to give him advice and while walking around he was solicited and spent money on salon, muscle training, fashion, being unable to decline any of them he ended up having no money left.

Kentaro, who changed his image, became famous among gay people and started to earn money in the park, but was found out by Yuu, the young man with the beautiful hair colour that he exchanged contacts with at the welcome party.
